DOC.brief_summary: To determine patient advanced cancer various degree hepatic impairment metabolise Cediranib .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 PK Study Cediranib Single Multiple Doses Hepatically Impaired Patients With Solid Tumours
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Advanced solid tumour ( prostate cancer ) standard therapy exists WHO performance status 02 Bilirubin level within target range Unstable brain/meningeal metastasis Inadequate bone marrow reserve Biochemistry/haematology result outside required range History significant GI impairment
